description:
Discover local store sales, weekly ads and coupons for 100+ retail stores including Target, Walmart, Macy’s, Kohl’s, Best Buy and many more. All in one convenient app!

Get ready to save big on Black Friday! Zoomingo has 4000+ deals, coupons and doorbusters from over 50 retailers. Browse deals by category or by store. We even include store timings so you can make sure to grab those doorbusters before they are gone!  

Zoomingo is highly personalized to your shopping needs. Simply select your favorite stores and, voila, Zoomingo  instantly creates your very own personalized “flyer”. Unlike other Weekly Ad apps that simply show you hard to read images of flyers on your phone, Zoomingo lets you easily view and save individual sale items.  You can instantly filter by category or search for specific items or coupons.

Best of all, our community of 2 million+ friendly shoppers will provide helpful shopping tips and alert you to hard to find local deals.

Cosmopolitan 
“$$$ - Saving app. Searching for the hot new dress (on sale) to wear tonight? Zoomingo, a free shopping app, now lets you search the best deals for any local store.”

Oprah Life Lift blog 
“Best for retail shopping & deals.”

Chicago Sun Times
“Save money this Back to School season”

Forbes 
“Best Shopping Apps for Black Friday Shopping”

Key Features: 
• Win Weekly Prizes by earning points for posting local deals & providing helpful tips to other shoppers. Establish your reputation as a Deal Diva and gain recognition as a top shopper in your community!
• Browse coupons, weekly ad & Sunday circulars from stores like Target, Walmart, Macys, Kohls, Toys R Us, Sears, JCPenney, Best Buy, CVS, Walgreens and many more. 
• Categories covered include fashion, clothing, beauty, handbags, shoes, home, kids, sports/fitness and electronics items.
• Like an item, but not the price? “Watch it” and we will send you a sale alert when the price drops. 
• Save your favorite deals and coupons to a shopping list in the app. A handy store locator and maps provide directions to the closest store.
trackCensoredName: Zoomingo Local Sales, Coupons, Weekly Ads for Target, Walgreens, Walmart, Macy's, Forever 21, H&M, CVS & Kohl's
trackName: Zoomingo Local Sales, Coupons, Weekly Ads for Target, Walgreens, Walmart, Macy's, Forever 21, H&M, CVS & Kohl's
releaseNotes:
Black Friday ads are here! Check out over 4000 hot deals, coupons and Doorbusters from over 50 top stores.  We even have store timings so you can plan your shopping and grab the doorbusters before they are gone.

Leave useful Black Friday shopping tips for other members of the Zoomingo community and you could win a $250 Black Friday shopping spree!
